lead_paragraph: Professional rugby is taking such a terrible physical and mental toll on the players, shortening careers and leaving a lifelong legacy of disability, that the soul of the sport is under threat, the head of the French players' union has warned.

headline.print_headline: Exclusive-Players Paying Too High a Price, Says Union Head
headline.main: Exclusive-Players Paying Too High a Price, Says Union Head

snippet: Professional rugby is taking such a terrible physical and mental toll on the players, shortening careers and leaving a lifelong legacy of disability, that the soul of the sport is under threat, the head of the French players' union has warned....
